price: 67. (Hud) respondió: “¡Pueblo mío!, no he perdido la razón, sino que soy un Mensajero del Señor de toda la creación.
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ لَيۡسَ بِي سَفَاهَةٞ وَلَٰكِنِّي رَسُولٞ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi laysa bī safāhatun walākinnī rasūlun min rabbi al-ʿālamīna
